# pixelFormatType

**Instance Property**

The model’s pixel format for an image feature.

## Declaration

```swift
var pixelFormatType: OSType { get }
```

## Accessing the constraints

- **pixelsWide**: The model’s default width for an image feature.
- **pixelsHigh**: The model’s default height for an image feature.

items.description: The model’s default width for an image feature.

items.description: The model’s default height for an image feature.
